item.title: About
item.description:
I am Manuel, student at University of C치diz.

Current Work

I am currently working as an intern on a software project at University of C치diz. This project is called “GuessIt!” and is an application for mobile platforms, mainly Android.

Tha aim of the project is achieve an app wich an student would use to learn languages like English or German.

GitHub Repository

Mail

manuelrdsg@gmail.com

item.title: Personal Projects
item.description:
TextAdventures

Developed by me and three friends (Luis Gonzaga Rozo Bueno, Juan Antonio Rodicio Lopez and Antonio Velez Estevez).

This was our first game, we wanted to made a text-based game stringly inspired by other similar games such as Zork. So we chose Java as our language and we focused on the design, usign Design Patterns.

If You want to know more about it, you could check out the wiki.

GitHub Repository.
